name: Moonbound
summary:
一个人独自在这个世界上会感到迷失和害怕，
　他们的灵魂被那些我曾经称为兄弟的人吞噬。
　他的守护者已失去踪影，但这不意味着终结。
　我的孩子，请把这个生物带到安全的港湾，
　现在所有的一切都靠你了。

Moonbound tells the story of Aya and Rudra, a little girl and her wolf pup, fleeing from the haunting invasion of dark spirits from beyond the Veil.

Both refugees and exiles, alone in this world, their only hope is to reach the Holy Land.
